rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I transferred here thinking
Gula was a peaceful place.

rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But now we have to deal with terrorists
even Meleph-sama can't catch?! How're
grunts like us going to stand a chance?!

rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Iira must be seething after
we caught one of their own!

rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0004
rows.name:
What if they're out to
exact their revenge?!

rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Even if I wanted to go back to the
homeland, with Morph-sama gone
there's nobody to grant approval!

rows.label: tlk45320123_02_msg0006
rows.name:
I can't take it any more!
None of us are going to
leave this place alive!!!
